title: Annies Ult is ready EVERY fight
body:
Anyone else fucking sick of her ult ALWAYS being there in EVERY fight?

Its god damn ridiculous and NOT fun to even play against. So fucking annoying.

replies.body: Her ulti has a pretty standard 120/100/80 cd.  With a bit of cdr late game its probably gonna be up every fight.  Also a good annie is probably going to avoid all ining you without ulti being off of cd so that might play into it.
Cool down starts on cast, and Tibber lasts for 45 seconds.
